title: Vater, lieber Vater. Vom Geheimnis geistlicher Vorbilder.
description: A book about mentoring, this work shows how an older person influences a younger person for good. Even more, it is an intenseely personal story of a man strong in his faith and steady in his walk who served as a spiritual mentor for his son. it is a tribute to the influence of a faithful father, and of God's faithfulness to generation after generation of his children.
author: Larry Crabb
